title: Publish current draft build to production (no functional changes)

requirements.summary: Prepare a production release of the current frontend draft without introducing functional changes, including clear publish/verification steps.
acceptanceCriteria: Production environment is updated to the latest draft version.
The production URL loads successfully and matches the draft build.

file_operations.description: Create a concise production release checklist describing how to publish the current draft build and validate the production URL matches the draft (build, deploy, cache-busting guidance, and post-deploy smoke checks). Ensure all user-facing text referenced in the checklist is English.

Add a lightweight, repeatable smoke-test checklist for production verification focused on existing routes and critical user flows (load app shell, navigation, login/logout behavior, key pages render, and Stripe success/failure routes load) with no product/UX changes.
